title: Stay at Choice Twice, Earn a Free Night this Fall -- ROCKVI
text:
ROCKVILLE, Md. Choice Privileges, the guest-loyalty program for Choice Hotels International, Inc. (NYSE: CHH ), announced today its fall promotion, Stay Two Times, Earn a Free Night! After taking two separate trips between September 3, 2015 and November 11, 2015 , Choice Privileges members in the U.S. and Canada will receive up to 8,000 points, enough for a free night at over 1,500 hotels. The promotion is available at participating hotels within the Ascend Hotel Collection, Cambria hotels & suites, Comfort Inn, Comfort Suites, Sleep Inn, Quality, Clarion, MainStay Suites, Suburban Extended Stay Hotel, Econo Lodge and Rodeway Inn brands.
"Our loyalty program members know that booking and staying with Choice gives them something extra," said Jamie Russo , vice president, loyalty programs at Choice Hotels International. "This fall, we brought back our fan-favorite promotion, Stay Two Times, Earn a Free Night. Members love it because, not only do they get rewarded, but they get rewarded fast. Whether visiting friends and family or traveling on business, members will have free nights in no time to use in the ways that matter most."
To participate in the promotion, members must register at ChoiceHotels.com/FreeNight before check-out. Guests can then make reservations on ChoiceHotels.com, the Choice Hotels mobile app, or by calling 800.4CHOICE. Corporate travelers can make accommodations through a travel agent or corporate online booking system. See ChoiceHotels.com/FreeNight for full details. Terms and conditions apply.
Not a Choice Privileges member? Sign up at ChoiceHotels.com/FreeNight to become a member and start earning today.
About Choice Hotels
Choice Hotels International, Inc. ® (NYSE: CHH ) is one of the world's largest lodging companies. With more than 6,300 hotels franchised in 35 countries and territories, we represent more than 500,000 rooms around the globe. As of June 30, 2015 , 613 hotels were in our development pipeline. Our company's Ascend Hotel Collection ® , Cambria ® hotels & suites, Comfort Inn ® , Comfort Suites ® , Sleep Inn ® , Quality ® , Clarion ® , MainStay Suites ® , Suburban Extended Stay Hotel ® , Econo Lodge ® and Rodeway Inn ® brands provide a spectrum of lodging choices to meet guests' needs. With more than 23 million members and counting, check out our Choice Privileges ® rewards program to see how you can reap the benefits of being a member of the Choice Hotels ® family. All hotels are independently owned and operated. Visit us at www.choicehotels.com for more information.
